name: supabase
description: Supabase is an open-source Firebase alternative providing Postgres, authentication, storage, and real-time APIs. It can be self-hosted or used as a fully managed cloud service.
features: PostgreSQL database: Provides full-featured Postgres with extensions and custom functions.
Authentication: Built-in user management with email, OAuth, and magic link support.
Real-time subscriptions: Broadcasts database changes to connected clients instantly.
Storage API: Manages file uploads with access control and CDN integration.
Auto-generated APIs: Creates REST and GraphQL APIs automatically from database schema.
Row-level security: Implements fine-grained access control using Postgres policies.
Edge functions: Runs serverless TypeScript functions at the edge for custom logic.
Database migrations: Manages schema changes with version-controlled migrations.
Dashboard UI: Provides web interface for database management and monitoring.
Client libraries: Offers SDKs for JavaScript, Python, Dart, and other languages.
Vector embeddings: Supports pgvector extension for AI and similarity search.
Backup and restore: Automated backups with point-in-time recovery options.
